summary: He Pushed Me Down the Stairs!
title: He Pushed Me Down the Stairs!
body:
Draco, fixing his slightly dishevelled hair as he enters the room: I'm here
Ron: Took you long enough
Hermione: You're late, what kept you?
Draco, straightening his tie: Oh, nothing
Ron and Hermione, freezing as they hear loud footsteps: What-
Harry, bursting in through the door with his hair messier than usual and his shirt ripped in various places: HE PUSHED ME DOWN THE FUCKING STAIRS!
Draco: Push is such a strong word... I prefer, 'gently nudge'
Harry, grabbing his wand: Oh I'll show you 'gently nudge' when I put my foot up your-
Hermione: BOYS!
Ron: Why are you two like this?

dialogue.label: Draco, fixing his slightly dishevelled hair as he enters the room:

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.description: Are you looking for a beta reader and you can't find one? Do you want to be a beta reader? You are in the right place! This blog tries to put in contact writers and betas from any fandom, read "How does it work" and get started!

title: Beta No 70!
body:
snazzyeggperson

Fandoms: Phan, Harry Potter, Carry On (+ any other Rainbow Rowell Book), and John Green book, most youtuber pairings, musical theatre 

No: Rape 

Ratings: All 

Type of beta reading: spelling, grammar, punctuation, flow, world-building, realism 

How to contact: DM on tumblr @snazzyeggperson with a story pitch

blog.name: crimsonrevolt-promo
blog.title: crimson revolt promo
blog.description: Crimson Revolt is a multi-para, literate roleplay group that takes place during the First Wizarding War. The group focuses on character and plot development through the themes of war and death. All edits posted here were created by the admins and members of Crimson Revolt and were posted with permission. For more information, please visit the main @crimsonrevolt.

summary: CRIMSON REVOLT ♔ CHARACTERS ♔ NAVIGATION ♔ ASK ♔ RULES   “How dreadful…     to be caught in a  G A M E         and have no idea...
caption:
CRIMSON REVOLT ♔ CHARACTERS ♔ NAVIGATION ♔ ASK ♔ RULES

“How dreadful…

to be caught in a G A M E

and have no idea of the rules.”

A FIRST WIZARDING WAR ROLEPLAY.

London is a battleground of chaos just daring her occupants to try and survive. War is relentless and intolerable, forcing brothers to fight brothers in a gory mess that threatens the very livelihood of community; and not just those possessing the gift of magic are in danger. While some dance in puddles of plasma, others cower in dark corners waiting for it all to end. No matter which side you choose, loss is inevitable while Lord Voldemort fights for control. Sometimes, it takes more than protocol to put an end to unnecessary bloodshed. It is in the rebels that we find hope and torn morals giving just about everyone a sense of unrest. They always did say fighting fire with fire never worked; but maybe a small spark will help bring an end to the rivalry.

WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?

We are a group of writers dedicated to plot and character development. As an 18+ group, we’re looking for mature, dedicated, and passionate people seeking a long term roleplay that will focus on themes such as war and death. Most threads on the dash are full of substance, which means most are paragraphs or longer gif chats! The Admin Team posts prompts, plot drops, and events as needed, averaging 1-2 major plot drops per month with smaller challenges and events in between. If you’re looking for a plot heavy group with surprises and twists, come apply today!

title: What's Worse?: Golden Trio
body:
Hermione, gesturing to the word 'dying' on a board: There's only one thing worse than dying.
Hermione, ripping off a piece of paper above the word 'dying' to reveal Harry's name:
Draco, passing by: Harry!
Hermione: No-

summary:
Sirius: okay what are you doing?
Sirius: r-remus i feel like we’re going a little too fast in our relationship
Sirius: but i’m...
body:
Sirius: okay what are you doing?

Sirius: r-remus i feel like we’re going a little too fast in our relationship

Sirius: but i’m okay with it if you are!

Sirius: i just didn’t know that you were into this kind of s—

Remus: sirius oh my god i was just reaching to get the salt.

The group focuses on character and plot development through the themes of war and death. All edits posted here were created by the admins and members of Crimson Revolt and were posted with permission. For more information, please visit the main @crimsonrevolt.

summary: CRIMSON REVOLT ♔ CHARACTERS ♔ NAVIGATION ♔ ASK ♔ RULES   “How dreadful…     to be caught in a  G A M E         and have no idea...
caption:
CRIMSON REVOLT ♔ CHARACTERS ♔ NAVIGATION ♔ ASK ♔ RULES

“How dreadful…

to be caught in a G A M E

and have no idea of the rules.”

A FIRST WIZARDING WAR ROLEPLAY.

London is a battleground of chaos just daring her occupants to try and survive. War is relentless and intolerable, forcing brothers to fight brothers in a gory mess that threatens the very livelihood of community; and not just those possessing the gift of magic are in danger. While some dance in puddles of plasma, others cower in dark corners waiting for it all to end. No matter which side you choose, loss is inevitable while Lord Voldemort fights for control. Sometimes, it takes more than protocol to put an end to unnecessary bloodshed. It is in the rebels that we find hope and torn morals giving just about everyone a sense of unrest. They always did say fighting fire with fire never worked; but maybe a small spark will help bring an end to the rivalry.

WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?

We are a group of writers dedicated to plot and character development. As an 18+ group, we’re looking for mature, dedicated, and passionate people seeking a long term roleplay that will focus on themes such as war and death. Most threads on the dash are full of substance, which means most are paragraphs or longer gif chats! The Admin Team posts prompts, plot drops, and events as needed, averaging 1-2 major plot drops per month with smaller challenges and events in between. If you’re looking for a plot heavy group with surprises and twists, come apply today!

blog.description:
"Magic is a respectable profession - no less than Law and a great deal more than Medicine" //
4th year medical student // Learning German and a little bit of Japanese //
Trying hard to keep my fandom ramblings @actuallyfeanor and away from this blog // aesthetic side blog @bonfire-nights // original content tagged #strangespeaks

summary:
Testing handwriting in GoodNotes and imagining how Harry Potter characters would have signed their names:

Harry signs his name...
caption:
Testing handwriting in GoodNotes and imagining how Harry Potter characters would have signed their names:

Harry signs his name in a hurry because he has better things to do as an auror. He deliberately obfuscates his last name slightly, so people won’t recognize it right off the bat

Ron has crappy handwriting. This is canon. He embraces it and makes it part of his image. He is a man of action, not words

Hermione’s signature is relaxed, yet stylish. She has spent years practicing that casual elegance that says “I’m neat and organized, but busy enough to not waste time making each letter unnecessarily elaborate”
